Override.entitydescription.antibloodloss2: A pack of O- blood substitute for the treatment of blood loss.\nUniversal Donor
Override.entitydescription.ntl_bloodpackoplus: A pack of O+ blood substitute for the treatment of blood loss.\nCan be donated to: O+, A+, B+, AB+
Override.entitydescription.ntl_bloodpackaminus: A pack of A- blood substitute for the treatment of blood loss.\nCan be donated to: A-, A+, AB-, AB+
Override.entitydescription.ntl_bloodpackaplus: A pack of A+ blood substitute for the treatment of blood loss.\nCan be donated to: A+, AB+
Override.entitydescription.ntl_bloodpackbminus: A pack of B- blood substitute for the treatment of blood loss.\nCan be donated to: B-, B+, AB-, AB+
Override.entitydescription.ntl_bloodpackbplus: A pack of B+ blood substitute for the treatment of blood loss.\nCan be donated to: B+, AB+
Override.entitydescription.ntl_bloodpackabminus: A pack of AB- blood substitute for the treatment of blood loss.\nCan be donated to: B-, B+, AB-, AB+
Override.entitydescription.ntl_bloodpackabplus: A pack of AB+ blood substitute for the treatment of blood loss.\nCan be donated to: B+, AB+
Override.entitydescription.ntl_emptybloodpack: An empty pack for blood substitute. Can be used to draw blood from healthy humans to receive a full blood pack of the appropriate blood type.
Override.entitydescription.ntl_synthesizedgenetic: Genetic material synthesized from creature remains.\nCan be deconstructed for unidentified genetic material.
Override.entitydescription.ntl_handheldhealthscan: A small handheld device that shows information about the vital signs and status of the target.
Override.afflictiondescription.ntl_bloodtypeoplus: Can receive from:O-, O+\nCan donate to:O+, A+, B+, AB+
Override.afflictiondescription.ntl_bloodtypeaminu: Can receive from: O-, A-\nCan donate to:A-, A+, AB-, AB+
Override.afflictiondescription.ntl_bloodtypeaplus: Can receive from:O-, O+, A-, A+\nCan donate to: A+, AB+
Override.afflictiondescription.ntl_bloodtypebminu: Can receive from: O-, B-\nCan donate to:B-, B+, AB-, AB+
Override.afflictiondescription.ntl_bloodtypebplus: Can receive from:O-, O+, B-, B+\nCan donate to: B+, AB+
Override.afflictiondescription.ntl_bloodtypeabmin: Can receive from: O-, B-\nCan donate to:B-, B+, AB-, AB+
Override.afflictiondescription.ntl_bloodtypeabplu: Can receive from:O-, O+, B-, B+\nCan donate to: B+, AB+
Override.afflictiondescription.ntl_bandaged: This limb has been bandaged. Taking it off without waiting some time for the injuries to heal might be a bad idea. Keep clean and dry.
Override.afflictiondescription.ntl_plastisealed: Plastiseal was been applied on this limb. Taking it off without waiting some time for the injuries to heal might be a bad idea.
Override.afflictiondescription.ntl_bloodfucked: This character has multiple blood type afflictions at the same time, do not administer any blood incompatible to any of them!\nIf this afflictions persists, please consult the steam workshop page of eXtended MedicaL.
Override.talentdescription.blooddonor: You can craft ‖color:gui.orange‖Blood Packs (O-)‖end‖ with ‖color:gui.orange‖Saline‖end‖ instead of ‖color:gui.orange‖Blood Packs‖end‖.
